info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 7:59PM EDT until July 28 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Louisa County in central Virginia... Northeastern Fluvanna County in central Virginia... * Until 830 PM EDT. * At 758 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles northwest of Boswells Tavern to near Charlottesville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Louisa, Ferncliff, Boswells Tavern, Troy, Gordonsville, Louisa Airport, Green Springs, Zion Crossroads, Union Mills, Waldrop, Byrd Mill, Trevilians, Wares Crossroads, and Vawter Corner. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
